answers.answer: I think since your so close to 37-40 weeks the contractions would start but if you notice them really severe. Happening every 5 minutes lasting 60 seconds call an ambulance
Is the pain your stomach or your back? Or both?

Im also a ftm and i was getting this really bad sharp pains in my lower belly like by my bladder kind of, and it was non stop for about a week, and i was as well freaking out and i called my dr and she said go to the hospital, but my mother in law had me wait it out because i had a dr apt in a few days, and my dr told me that it was just my muscles in my belly streching from the baby and i should get a pregnancy belt. But your futher along than me. I.have an ultrasound Tuesday and ill be 29 weeks then. I hope everything is okay and.good luck!
I have the pain in my stomach and my back about 80% of the time

question: I'm 32 weeks today with my first child and I have these unbearable pains in my lower right side . I constantly have this downward pressure in my uterus but I don't think I've lost my plug yet. I go to the Dr. on Tuesday. Should I wait until then or go to the ER.? No preeclampsia, no diabetes, labs have been normal. I just get worried bc it seems hard to differentiate between braxton-hicks and something else.
title: FTM and little worried
